thread.title: Help us pick the finalists in our search for Detroit's Best Burger
thread.title_full: Help us pick the finalists in our search for Detroit's Best Burger

author: John Gonzalez | gonzo@mlive.com
title: Help us pick the finalists in our search for Detroit's Best Burger
text:
Help us pick the finalists in our search for Detroit's Best Burger gonzo-amy-burgers-2.png John Gonzalez and Amy Sherman are searching for Detroit's Best Burger. Vote now through March 3, 2017. Visits will take place the week of March 6. (Milt Klingensmith/ MLive) comments 
DETROIT, MI -- Now we really need your help! 
We received more than 80 nominations in our search for Detroit's Best Burger , and it's time to pair down the list so we can visit some of your favorites. 
Starting today you can vote in our polls to determine the best of the best. 
We have broken down the polls this way: Downtown Detroit/Midtown/Corktown 
The voting begins today and will continue until noon, March 3, 2017. 
You can vote every three hours. And you can vote in all the polls. 
Once we have our top finalists, MLive's Amy Sherman and I will hit the road to sample each place. 
Criteria: We're looking for quality, fresh and tasty burgers. Creativity is great, but so is simple because sometimes those are the best. You want to be able to taste that juicy burger, right? 
If you have any questions, feel free to email us: 
Amy is at 
John is at 
Oh, and follow us on Twitter. We're always interacting with followers and sharing our daily adventures. 
Amy on Twitter at @amyonthetrail 
John on Twitter at @MichiganGonzo
